reviewText: I'm sorry but I just cannot recommend this game.  While the premise is cute and inviting, the level design just kills this game for me.  Its clunky, confusing, and doesn't make a lick of sense.  It makes this game borderline unplayable.

reviewText: The artwork is nice but everything else is pretty awful. The intro, cutscenes, and dialogue make it look like the game was designed with young children in mind (which is strange that the first level refers to enemies as badasses"); personally I found it insufferable
date: but thankfully it can be skipped.\n\nThe controls are clunky
recommended: the levels are bland/irritating due to control issues
hoursPlayed: the invincible enemies are slow-moving and only add to frustration as you wait for them to move to the right spot
